title: Masaan
writer: Akbar Allahabadi, Bashir Badr, Brij Narayan Chakbast
short_cast: Richa Chadda, Sanjay Mishra, Vicky Kaushal, Shweta Tripathi Sharma, Vinit Kumar, Pankaj Tripathi, Bhagwan Tiwari, Bhupesh Singh, Satya Kam Anand, Nikhil Sahni
cast: Richa Chadda, Sanjay Mishra, Vicky Kaushal, Shweta Tripathi Sharma, Vinit Kumar, Pankaj Tripathi, Bhagwan Tiwari, Bhupesh Singh, Satya Kam Anand, Nikhil Sahni
genre: Social Issue Dramas, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Dramas, Independent Movies
desc: Along India's Ganges River, four people face prejudice, a strict moral code and a punishing caste system as they confront personal tragedies.
